name: Streaming Beam DF Job
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that stream logistic data from GCS ,uses PTransform to transform the file records, and writes the results to a BigQuery

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.label: BQ table name
parameters.helpText: Write Streaming data to BQ table name

parameters.name: errorBucket
parameters.label: Invalid record or BQ failed insert write to GCS
